document_data.name: Poutine
document_data.mainbody: '''Poutine''' was a type of food found in [[Baldur's Gate]] and the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: Poutine was a type of food found throughout the Western Heartlands along the shores of the [[River Chionthar]]. It was a savory dish consisting of fried [[potato]] strips topped with [[cheese]] and [[gravy]]. A poutine usually sold for 20 [[gp]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
